response.overview: 'if only i had wings' is a short film exploring the intersection of urban and rural landscapes in CÃ³rdoba, Spain. Drawing on key historical themes and personal connections, the film focuses on the fundamental elements of cinema to engage with the dynamic nature of place. above all, it is an invitation to consider the deep, transformative relationships between humans and their environment, acknowledge their inexhaustible complexity and delve into the infinite density of the small events that compose them.
response.title: if only i had wings
